parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags. This parameter is valid only when the **Tagkeys** is empty. Valid values:

*   true: All the data is deleted.
*   false: Not all of them are deleted.

Default value: false

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which you want to create the instance.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to cluster.

parameters.name: TagKeys
parameters.description: The key of the label. Valid values of N: 1 to 20.
